TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HashingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class HashingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: This transformer can hash either single valued columns or vector columns. For vector columns, it hashes each slot separately. It can hash either text values or key values.

Docs.param: Description of dataset columns and how to process them.
Docs.summary: Constructor for case where you don't need to 'train' transform on data, for example, InvertHash for all columns set to zero.
